other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates normal echotexture with no focal lesions. The portal vein is patent with normal hepatopetal flow. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation. There is a mobile gallstone within the gallbladder measuring approximately 1 cm with no signs of wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. The pancreas is not visualized due to overlying bowel gas. Limited views of the left and right kidney are unremarkable without hydronephrosis. The spleen is not enlarged and measures 8.2 cm. There is no free fluid within the abdomen.
